name: Finance Navigator (Basic)
description: What is Finance Navigator?Mindful Finance is a minimalistic suite of no-code tools built with Notion that helps you navigate the world of money madness without stress and anxiety. Finance Navigator is the flagship money-managing tool in this series. Instead of simply tracking your finances, the proven method of using a zero-based budget helps to provide a system that guides our behavior and nurture healthy monetary habits. More information on Finance Navigator available in this page.Finance Navi
features: Mindful Financeis a minimalistic suite of no-code tools built with Notion that helps you navigate the world of money madness without stress and anxiety.; Automated Dashboard - Provides a complete overview of your financial health that ease your mind and empower your finances; Manage multiple accounts - Know exactly how much you have and where your funds are located; Track expenses - Have a good grasp of your cashflow situation and identify areas where you are overspending; Track income - Monitor your earnings to facilitate tax reporting; Mobile support - Full support for daily transactions input via mobile devices; Minimalistic design - Powerful enough to be used out of the box and  customizable for your specific needs; Easy setup - Quick start guide available that helps you to start using Finance Navigator under 15 minutes, plus complete documentation for all the functionality included.
